abilities.name: Cyber-Agility
abilities.description: Thanks to his cybernetic abilities, Genji can climb walls and perform jumps in mid-air.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Genji looses three deadly throwing stars in quick succession.

abilities.name: Fan of Blades
abilities.description: Alternatively, he can throw three shuriken in a wider spread.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Genji dashes in the direction of the cursor, dealing damage to every enemy he passes through. The cooldown is refreshed if he kills someone.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: While the ability is active, any frontal ranged attack will be deflected in the direction of Genji's crosshairs. Using Swift Strike or Dragonblade will cancel Deflect.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Genji brandishes his katana for a brief period of time. Until he sheathes his sword, Genji can deliver killing strikes to any targets within his reach.
